title: ICurveDrivenPatternFeatureData.AutoSelect
description: Gets whether to automatically select all bodies in a multibody part intersected by this curve-driven pattern feature.
returns: True to automatically select all bodies intersected by this curve driven pattern feature, false to specify affected bodies
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ICurveDrivenPatternFeatureData::GeometryPattern
is true.
Call
ICurveDrivenPatternFeatureData::SetFeatureScope
to set this property.
For more information, see the
Curve Driven Patterns and the
Curve Driven Pattern PropertyManager
topic in the SOLIDWORKS Design user-interface help.
